protocol.name: P-GSE63131-1
text: Microarray data were extracted from scanned GeneChip images and analyzed by use of Microarray Suite version 5.0.1 (Affymetrix) and BioConductor (
). ID_REF =  VALUE = The chip data as transformed with log2.

protocol.name: P-GSE63131-2
protocol.text: Arabidopsis seedlings were cold treated at 0 °C for 24 h in growth chamber (16-h day length at 70% relative humidity).

protocol.name: P-GSE63131-3
protocol.text: Seeds were sterilized with 70% ethanol, 0.05% Triton X-100 for 10 min and then washed with 95% ethanol, 0.05% Triton X-100 for 10 min, with 95% ethanol was for 10 min. A final washed with ddH2O for 3times, put into ddH2O in 4°C 48h. Seeds were sown on deep Petri plates with semisolid MS germination medium (Mock), added aza-dC and/or TSA. All seedlings kept in a growth chamber (16 h light and 8 h darkness, 70% relative humidity, 23 °C) for 16 days before being harvested.

protocol.name: P-GSE63131-4
protocol.text: RNA were extracted using RNA purification kit (Norgen, Canada) following the manufacturer’s manual.

protocol.name: P-GSE63131-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE63131-6
protocol.text: Hybridization, washing, and staining were performed according to the Affymetrix manufacturer’s Instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE63131-7
protocol.text: Microarrays were scanned using a ScanArray 4000 Microarray Acquisition System.
